Class StudentView

java.lang.Object
src.view.UserView
src.view.StudentView
All Implemented Interfaces:
viewApplication, viewInternship
public class StudentView extends UserView implements viewInternship, viewApplication
View layer for Student user interface.

Provides a menu-driven interface for students to browse internship opportunities, submit applications, manage their applications, and generate filtered internship reports. Extends UserView for authentication and implements viewInternship and viewApplication for viewing internships and applications.

    • StudentView

      public StudentView(StudentController studentController)
      Constructs a StudentView with the given controller.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the student view by displaying the login menu.
      Specified by:
      start in class UserView

    • displayStudentMenu

      public int displayStudentMenu()
      Displays the main student menu and retrieves the user's choice.

      Presents 7 menu options including internship browsing, application management, password change, and logout. Validates input and ensures a valid choice is returned.

      Returns:
      an integer (1-7) representing the user's menu selection

    • runStudentMenuLoop

      public void runStudentMenuLoop()
      Runs the main menu loop for authenticated students.

      Displays a menu with 7 options including viewing internships, managing applications, changing password, and logging out. Routes each selection to appropriate handler methods.

    • viewApplications

      public void viewApplications()
      Displays all internship applications submitted by the current student.

      Retrieves the student's applications from the controller and displays each one using viewApplicationDetails(InternshipApplication). Shows a message if no applications exist.

      Specified by:
      viewApplications in interface viewApplication

    • viewApplicationDetails

      public void viewApplicationDetails(InternshipApplication application)
      Displays detailed information for a single internship application.
      Specified by:
      viewApplicationDetails in interface viewApplication
      Parameters:
      application - the InternshipApplication to display

    • viewInternshipDetails

      public void viewInternshipDetails(Internship internship)
      Displays detailed information for a single internship.
      Specified by:
      viewInternshipDetails in interface viewInternship
      Parameters:
      internship - the Internship to display

    • viewInternships

      public void viewInternships()
      Displays all available internship opportunities for the current student.

      Retrieves the student's available internship opportunities from the controller and displays each one using viewInternshipDetails(Internship). Shows a message if no internships are available.

      Specified by:
      viewInternships in interface viewInternship
